sections.title: Grafana Consulting Advisory and Implementation
sections.description: With the help of Grafana, our team of architects and consultants help you to query and visualize data and logs from wherever they are stored. Helping you with expert advisory, recommendations and a roadmap to implement Grafana.
offerings: Our Grafana implementation experts help you deploy and configure Grafana to analyze and track data.
The team of experts will help to deploy the stack for maximum transparency, instant alerts, and improved troubleshooting.
Visualize valuable data and act instantly on issues.

sections.title: Query, Visualize and Explore Data from Different Sources
sections.description: The Grafana experts help you connect with every possible data source (databases) such as Graphite, Prometheus, Influx DB, ElasticSearch, MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.
offerings: The Grafana consultants advise best practices to bring your data together to get better context.
Easily query, visualize, set up alerts and understand the data with the help of metrics.
We enable getting insights from multiple sources on a single dashboard.
Our experts help you to understand data as per business needs with different visualization options.

sections.title: Set up and Schedule Grafana Reports
sections.description: With Grafana reporting, one can pull key metrics and trends out of dashboards and distribute them to stakeholders who need them for making data-driven operational decisions in their everyday work.
offerings: Team of Grafana consultants advise and create visual reports, layouts, and PDF reports.
Grafana experts walk you through how you can schedule reports from Grafana dashboards (Daily, Weekly, etc).
The engineers help you with regular workflows including, sharing reports on email or Slack channel.

sections.title: Instant Actions using Alerts
sections.description: Grafana alerting helps you to know problems in your infrastructure/applications moments after they occur. Create, manage, and take action on your alerts in a single, consolidated view, and improve your team’s ability to identify and resolve issues quickly.
offerings: The Grafana experts help you define thresholds and get notified via Slack, PagerDuty, etc.
You can set alerting rules which define when an alert will be triggered.
Construct notification policies to define how and where an alert gets routed.
Setting up contact points configuration for alerts to take actions.
